com.xtremelabs.robolectric.shadows
Class ShadowContext

java.lang.Object
  com.xtremelabs.robolectric.shadows.ShadowContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
ShadowContextWrapper
@Implements(value=android.content.Context.class)
public class ShadowContext
extends java.lang.Object

Calls through to the resourceLoader to actually load resources.
